entry.title: WIND WARNING , Hendrickson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:19 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 01:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border late this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
